content: intro ----- tuku is a little baby bird that hatched 2023-09-29 on the mooneye studios discord server as its mascot https //discord gg/s79dpvnx3z 1 as a forest spirit its natural fur color of green can change depending on the season orange in fall white in winter pink in spring or yellow in summer so feel free to use other colors for halloween it also likes to dress up in a costume e g as a werewolf mushroom eww or as a black cat scary measurements ------------ its main body without appendices has a diameter of about 8 5cm -9 0cm comfortly fitting into one hand with fully spread wings it reaches a width of about 20cm i used yarn under / yarn over as a crochet technique yarns ----- * green chenille yarn for its upper body bulky * yellow white-ish chenille yarn for its lower body bulky * red chenille yarn for its cheeks feet and tail bulky * black chenille yarn for its eyes and mouth bulky * white chenille yarn for the eye highlights bulky 1 https //discord gg/s79dpvnx3z
